author: balld
msg: a doozy of a patch to esql - i made it so that you can execute queries eitherin their own special methods or inlined code - both on the same page even (can't imagine why you'd want to tho).
syntax is documented in sample - all you do is add a inner-method attribute valued 'no'. default is 'yes', but i'm definitely considering switching it.
